replies.body: Post this to Skins and Champion Concepts, it looks excellent.

> [{quoted}](name=GaleWinUnleashed,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=z5i8FZN7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-14T22:48:44.716+0000)
>
> Post this to Skins and Champion Concepts, it looks excellent.

Riot made it. It's from today's PBE update, but under the name "nidalee_skin_7". Clearly bullocks, as anyone can tell exactly which two champions they are.
lol i wouldnt say anyone lol tons and i mean TONS of people couldnt figure out who Naut (The Big Guy) was in the art. Some even said azir....i dont know where you see a bird at lol
Its scary to post in any where but miscellaneous because it might get taken down for being in the wrong category. At least thats why I always post to Miscellaneous unless im 100% sure.

This post could live in "Gameplay and Balance" or "Skins and Champion Concepts" or even "Misc" as it is now. We're currently working with the moderation team to help come to a better understanding of the behavior on Boards as well taking a look at the Board names to make sure everything makes a little more sense. More on that to come. 

As for this sketch, looks epic though definitely very rough and unfinished. Whether it evolves into something else or stays a pipe dream, pretty cool look into the mind of the artist.

I would love to have that Nautilus skin ... 
Of course I'm also still waiting for Crusader Mordekaiser :(
They're most likely the first two of the five Samsung White skins.
All five champs would be in the same image, though.
It was said that the image wasn't finished yet, and somehow it accidentally got leaked onto the PBE.
Did they really play Naut and Sivir at worlds? :o
if i remember correctly, it doesn't matter what champions they played. each member of the winning team chose a champion to get the team skin
then they're saints for picking naut and sivir to finally get skins.
No, I think they played Corki and Rengar (for ADC and Jungle)
Im guessing more of a justicar theme for them, but yea the samsung team did win worlds but no skin.
I definitely hope it's not just a pipe dream, especially since the splash alone made me want to play these champions when I never had an interest to before.
I do not believe that this comment belongs in miscellaneous. Surely it is better in Boards Feedback.

The first time I played Naut I was TERRIBLE at him, but this unfinished splash art was so cool that I bought Nautilus and played a game with him. Our midlaner DCed 2 minutes in so I went mid, got 2 kills, our midlaner came back, I went back to jungle. Ended up 12/6. I love Naut now
I think the obvious answer is that Sivir is being reworked into a Gundam pilot.
It's got the same color scheme as Battleborn Kayle
Also, the same blue oval gems.

Didn't even think about that, this could be a grouped splash like the Pentakill skins, just with Vel'koz and Nidalee left out.
Although I doubt they would come out with two new Nidalee skins so close together, since she's getting a Warring Kingdoms skin, I had just assumed they labeled this splash as a Nid skin by mistake or just as a placeholder

It's a pretty damn safe bet that it's not actually related to Nidalee. When she gets a new skin, then a splash art is uploaded saying it's for her, but that clearly shows two other easily identified champions, it's a bit silly to assume she's getting TWO skins.
It says Nidalle skin on S@20, I wonder why.
cause that's what it's listed as in the PBE files. It's an unfinished splash, so obviously all the characters haven't been added.
Rioter said this was a mistake and not the nidalee splash art whatsoever
And where was this?

http://i.imgur.com/QMjrsAT.jpg

Nurse Flan commented on it

Oh that.  That doesn't say anything about it NOT being a nidalee skin though.. That just says it's NOT Warring Kingdoms.

Obviously Group splashes take a lot of work and they could very well throw her in there since it's not done yet.
It's not Warring Kingdoms, and the chances of them making another skin just for this splash art are slim to none.
Do you read? I just said that it's not WK.  It's not really that slim.. they work on many skins back and forth.  Some champs end up with a few skins next to each other fairly quickly.
Theres never been a champ that had skins come out at the same time. Or at least on pbe at same time

Yes, but who says this one is for something soon? There's no skins on PBE that go with what's seen so far in the splash afterall.  Pretty sure it was pushed out way early (since it's incomplete and all).

Dude. Don't know why you insist on deluding yourself... it literally makes no sense for one champion to have two skin releases back to back. I'd put the likelihood of ANY other champ getting a new skin higher than Nid's.
Again, who says it's a skin that's coming any time soon? It was placed there before it was even finished.
Why would they post the splash to a skin that isn't coming anytime soon?
Sweet neither confirmed nor denied it was Nidalee.
Samsung skins maybe? When are the world champ skins usually released?

It might be, but judging by previous Champion Team skins, they usually have like headphones and other computer accessories and are dressed in street clothes, not armor. Not impossible, but not likely either. 

Besides, wouldn't Imp for sure have Twitch as his skin? He dominated with Twitch and he was one of the few that consistently played Twitch! I just don't think Samsung White players would pick Sivir or Naut. (Sorry Sivir and Naut :()
Could these be more skins for the Arbiter line?
Maybe, I was wondering why it was called Arbiter Vel'koz instead of Justicar Vel'koz to go alone with Justicar Aatrox and Syndra
You forgot about Justicar Varus ;–;

> [{quoted}](name=Rew711,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=z5i8FZN7,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2015-01-15T00:24:08.831+0000)
>
> You forgot about Justicar Varus ;–;

i thought that too but technically that skin is "Archlight varus"
This is one of the coolest depictions of Nautilus that I've seen. If he somehow becomes good, I'll definitely start playing him again.
They're literally giving him an enormous shield buff tonight with 5.1, and he's not even bad right now.

Battleborn skins .....
Kampfgeborene wie der Kayle skin
Anyone else see ornstein and smough here? http://www.isolaillyon.it/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/2418715-smough_and_ornstein.jpg
That's Sivir in the foreground, and if you eye the background... who is related to Sivir that was JUST released not too long ago? Azir gets a new skin too. Arbiter theme.

Background is Nautilus

And they look like Championship skins.
